entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Near blizzard developing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 47 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:26 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
